name: TapPlusMinus(탭더하기빼기)
description:
Elementary school students to start learning the Plus&Minus
And The Plus&Minus app that everyone can enjoy .

TapPlusMinus is a brain development application that allows searching wits , calculate the Plus&Minus .

◈Features of TapPlusMinus APP
Not just learning Plus&Minus app , the app more interesting game .
Elementary school students as well as anyone can enjoy .
Tap Game, as well as you can practice simple calculator.

And to friends and people around the world you can boast and share their scores .

Depending on the options you can control the speed and score .

◈TapPlusMinus APP

- +/- , + , -
Select the Sign, you can enjoy the game in its Sign

- single-digit
Has a single-digit, you can learn through fun Tap Game.
The more score falling faster block.
So, without boring you get the fun and sense of accomplishment.

-double digits & Three digits
single-digit and style is the same.
A bit difficult because the double digits.
However , the more likely points that can be obtained because of more difficult .

- calculator
Use the plus and minus calculator you can practice.

- Rank
You can enjoy the rank with people .

- Option
Easy, Normal, Hard
Speed ??coming down the block and score will vary depending on options.
